Body:
sub_win.SubscriberWindows.FRAME_DICT = {}
with mock.patch.object(cv2, 'namedWindow'), mock.patch.object(sub_win.
    SubscriberWindows, 'update'), mock.patch.object(sub_win.
    SubscriberWindows, 'loop') as mock_loop:
    sw = sub_win.SubscriberWindows()
    sw.close_threads.append(mock.MagicMock())
    sw.block()
    mock_loop.assert_called_once()
    sw.close_threads[0].join.assert_called_once()
